Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.2.6/jquery.js">
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	var gadget = {
		moduleId: __MODULE_ID__,
		baseUrl: 'http://election-maps-2008.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/'
	};
	
	function script( url, seconds ) {
		document.write(
			'<script type="text/javascript" src="',
				_IG_GetCachedUrl( url, { refreshInterval:seconds } ),
			'">',
			'<\/script>'
		);
	}
	
	script( gadget.baseUrl + 'poll411-maker.js', 60 );
	
</script>
